/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of beige and brown, reflecting the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with the beige and brown of the buildings contrasting against the gray of the overcast sky.
